content: closed see instructions needle knitwise into next stitch leaving stitch on needle for kitchener stitch then work heel pull yarn through heel continue grafting stitches until one stitch remains on pick up right leg of each stitch in the row above and each needle remove needles tighten up any loose or below waste yarn if you placed lifelines these will be uneven stitches the stitches your lifelines run through 18 20 22 24 finishing 28 32 36 stitches picked up for each row 36 40 44 48 56 64 72 total stitches picked up make two socks weave in ends wash and block page 4 | knox socks designed by sasha macdonell for knox mountain knit co © 2022 http //www ravelry com/designers/knox-mountain-knit-co pattern support knoxmountainknitco@gmail com
